thread.title: Obese woman drops 8st – you won't believe what she looks like now
thread.title_full: Obese woman drops 8st – you won't believe what she looks like now

title: Obese woman drops 8st – you won't believe what she looks like now
text:
BIGGER BEFORE: Kate Turner used to weigh a whopping 19st 
Kate Turner weighed more than 19st before undergoing a lifesaving gastric band surgery. 
But now, after dropping six dress sizes, the 35-year-old has got her health back and has even tied the knot after shedding the pounds. 
She said: "The operation was a matter of life or death as my organs were already damaged. 
"My spleen was enlarged and I had to have my gall bladder removed. 
"Not to mention the number of operations to my knees due to being so overweight. 
"I had to lose the weight for my kids Harry, nine and Ronnie, five, I wanted to be a good role model for them." Amazing real life body transformations Tuesday, 29th November 2016 Take a look at these exceptional body transformations. 1 / 30 Caters Elora Harre, 23 has lost eight stone 
The mum-of-two - who has compared herself to The Little Mermaid's hefty sea witch Ursula before her weight loss - was recently asked to step in play the role of Elsa from Frozen for a local business when their impersonator cancelled. 
Kate was overwhelmed, not only was it a huge compliment but it showed her how far she'd come since her weight loss surgery. “I look and feel about 10 years younger” Kate Turner 
The boutique shop owner, said: "A local business needed someone to dress up as Elsa after an impersonator they'd hired cancelled last minute. 
"It was just before Christmas and when they asked, I couldn't say no. 
"With my hair plaited to the side and wearing the blue Elsa-inspired dress, I actually looked similar to the Disney character. 
"I had to sing along to all the tracks as well, it was slightly embarrassing but it showed how far I'd come since my gastric band." 
CATERS FAIRYTALE: Kate was asked to impersonate Elsa from Disney film Frozen 20 fat-burning foods that help you lose weight Tuesday, 3rd January 2017 20 fat-burning foods that help you lose weight 1 / 20 Getty Images Avacodo - includes monosaturated fatty acids that are more likely to be used as slow burning energy than stored as body fat 
Kate was a size 24 when she decided to have the gastric band fitted - she'd tried every diet going but nothing worked. And after being warned by doctors about her debilitating health problems, she knew she needed to act fast. 
Kate explained: "I was happy being plus sized but I knew it wasn't healthy. 
"My portion sizes were huge, I loved all food and I'd never think twice about ordering two meals from McDonald's and an extra burger to drive with. 
"I couldn't buy any nice clothes on the high street and I was unable to walk or do any kind of exercise as my knees were so sore. 
"But having a gastric band wasn't the quick fix I first thought it was, it was almost £6,000 and I was in for a shock after surgery. 
"I could no longer eat large portions and was instantly on a liquid diet until my smaller stomach got used to it. 
“It was a relief that I would start to lose weight as I was borderline diabetic before my surgery but it was a real shock afterwards. 
"Thankfully I had my supportive husband, Kieran, 39, on hand to ensure I got through it all." 
CATERS SUPER SLIMMER: Kate had a lifesaving gastric band surgery to shed pounds 
The stunning blonde now weighs 11st and wears a slimline size 12 dress. But she decided to set up a plus-size boutique, Love The Size Your In, after she started to lose weight. 
She said: "I was determined to help other women who were a size 16 plus, I knew exactly how they felt and wanted to ensure they could buy trendy clothes." 
Since her drastic body transformation, Kate has managed to maintain her slim physique by exercising and eating healthily. 
Kate said: "I would chose a chicken salad instead of a burger and chips now, I try to go to the gym and I look and feel about 10 years younger. 
"I had parents coming up to me and complimenting how good I looked when I dressed up as Elsa just before Christmas." Related videos
